response.overview: Mike Reid, the TV Star, appears as you've never seen him before, in this special video presentation.  No holds are barred as he delivers his uncensored and strictly adult only stand-up comedy routine. Devastatingly funny and totally unstoppable, it's a whirlwind of a performance which leaves no areas of life unmentioned. Sex, religion and politics all get the same down to earth treatment, as Mike Reid displays to a celebrity audience, the comic genius which first brought him to fame. An unforgettable and specially made video performance from one of Britain's best-loved stars. Your one and only chance to see the real Mike Reid!
response.title: Mike Reid: Live - Uncensored
